response.overview: Keisuke Yoshida’s Spring/Summer 2026 collection, titled Refresh and Relaxation, premiered at Estnation in Roppongi Hills on a humid July evening, grounding youthful poise in Tokyo’s urban pulse. His silhouettes challenge tradition—deconstructed lapels swell and twist, waistbands double as necklines, and denim pockets ripple upward to evoke casual disarray in motion. Mood-heavy colors and textured volumes—deep blues, dusty mauves, mint tulle overlays—paired with symbolic accessories like kasa hats and dandelion pins, all reinforce a narrative of strength threaded with exhaustion and emotional nuance.
response.title: KEISUKEYOSHIDA 2026 Spring/Summer Collection
